UnitDefinition.Name: Assessment group membership calculation methods
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Assessment group membership calculation methods. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Any (crisp)
Unit.Description: Assign the highest membership value as membership. For crisp memberships, assign positive substance membership if any model indicates positive membership, and negative membership otherwise.

Unit.Name: Majority (crisp)
Unit.Description: Assign positive substance membership if the majority of the membership models indicates positive membership, otherwise, the substance is considered not to be in the assessment group.

Unit.Name: Ratio (probabilistic)
Unit.Description: Express substance membership as a probability ranging from zero (certainly out) to one (certainly in), computed as the average membership score.

Unit.Name: Bayesian (probabilistic)
Unit.Description: Express substance memberships as a probability with values ranging from zero (certainly out) to one (certainly in) computed using a Bayesian approach.
